name: BYOB Sprite File
summary: Learn about .YSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Scratch uses .SPRITE files for sprites. BYOB also uses the ".sprite" extension, although the primary sprite extension is ".ysp."
NOTE: BYOB is now developed under the name Snap!

description: Graphics file used by BYOB (Build Your Own Blocks), a variant of the creative programming application Scratch; contains a 2D image and animation settings; often used for program characters or game objects.
